name: MarCraft
tagline: SpaceApps challenge 2016 - Open World Generation using NASA Mars and Vesta Data
body:
## The Challenge
Create a custom world map generator module using a gaming framework or engine of your choice that leverages altimeter, terrain and imagery data to render realistic worlds. This will involve the use of a World Map Tile Service client to leverage over 1 TB of Mars and Vesta data for use in world generation. [Click here](https://2016.spaceappschallenge.org/challenges/solar-system/open-world-generation-using-nasa-mars-and-vesta-data) for the full description.

## Introduction
Gamers use to play their favorite space games over generated planet terrains. How wonderful would it be to play them over real terrains, so we can have our first experience out of this world!

# Our solution!
***
![logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oscaresgil/marcraft/gh-pages/images/MarCraft.png)

We created a Minecraft Mod where you can explore **real** Mars' surface (and Vesta's in the near future), and have fun with an entertaining game. The first game we are introducing is **Find Rover** where you have to find Rover before your friends.

![MarCraft 1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oscaresgil/marcraft/gh-pages/images/s1.png)
![MarCraft 2](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oscaresgil/marcraft/gh-pages/images/s2.png)
![MarCraft 3](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oscaresgil/marcraft/gh-pages/images/s3.png)

## The Server
The platform is now running in a server that is storing all height maps of Mars. We plan to include other planets too. Request are available only through the mod.

![MarCraft old](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oscaresgil/marcraft/gh-pages/images/m1.png)

## The Future
We also want to have a server to host this mod so that people can share with us this experience, and probably contribute creating a new game.
Our final goal is to have a scalable tool capable of generating height maps using current and future NASA's tile images, and to share this information as an open source library, so other users can generate worlds on their own platforms.
### About us
We are passionate developers living in Guatemala. Our team members are:

The official NASA project is [here](https://2016.spaceappschallenge.org/challenges/solar-system/open-world-generation-using-nasa-mars-and-vesta-data/projects/marcraft).
